    void
    User.travelPlanning​(String destination, int id, int startDayOfMonths, int startValueOfMonth, int startYear, int endDayOfMonths, int endValueOfMonth, int endYear)
    this method allows you to plan a trip (invoking the Travel class constructor) by entering a destination, an id (of the trip), a travel start day, a travel start month, a travel start year, a travel end day, a month end of the trip, one year of end of the trip.
